DOC.brief_summary: Polymorphism codon 16 beta2-adrenoceptor ( beta2-AR ) affect responsiveness salmeterol asthmatic . Data concern formoterol controversial literature . The aim study verify whether homozygote arginine-16 ( ArgArg16 ) homozygote glycine-16 ( GlyGly16 ) genotypes differently influence long-term responsiveness formoterol .
DOC.brief_title: Polymorphism beta2-adrenoceptor Regular Use Formoterol Asthma
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate asthma Stable clinical condition Smokers Current therapy oral steroid Exacerbations within past 3 month
